SEARCH
Package net.tangly.core

Class Comment

java.lang.Object
net.tangly.core.Comment
All Implemented Interfaces:
HasMutableTags, HasTags
public class Comment extends Object implements HasMutableTags
Defines a human-readable annotation to an entity. A comment is an immutable object. Comments can be tagged to provide classification. A comment belongs to the entity owning it an is only accessible through this entity.
